DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether intensive lipid lower Omega-3 fatty acid effective treatment coronary atherosclerotic plaque .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Intensive Lipid Lowering Omega-3 Fatty Acid Composition Coronary Atherosclerotic Plaque
DOC.criteria: Acute coronary syndrome within 48 hour symptom onset Have de novo nonculprit coronary artery stenosis 20 % 70 % visual estimation Cardiogenic shock ST segment elevation myocardial infarction within 1 week Hematologic disorder : neutropenia ( neutrophil < 3000/mm3 ) , thrombocytopenia ( platelet < 100,000/mm3 ) Liver enzyme elevation : serum aspartate aminotransferase alanine aminotransferase concentration 3 time upper limit normal Impaired renal function serum creatinine > 2mg/dL Bleeding diathesis history coagulopathy Pregnancy Hypersensitivity heparin , dye , aspirin , clopidogrel , statin , fish
